inclusion.criterion: previous visits to ED or primary care for asthma care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: clinical decision by ED attending physician to admit to ACU after standardized initial ED treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: sickle cell disease, cystic fibrosis, or cardiac disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: systemic corticosteroid treatment within two weeks of presenting to the ED
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has asthma and was admitted to the emergency department with a diagnosis of severe asthma exacerbation. He is a candidate for general corticosteroid therapy.
